text: Neuilly-la-Forêt is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the commune of Isigny-sur-Mer.Arrêté préfectoral 8 September 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Neuilly-la-Forêt
